column2: Mrs. Will Kennicott and son Hugh left on No. 24 on Saturday last for a stay of some months in Minneapolis, Chicago, New York and Washington. Mrs. Kennicott confided to _Ye Scribe_ that she will be connected with one of the multifarious war activities now centering in the Nation's Capital for a brief period before returning.
column3: mrs Will Kennicott and son Hugh left on no twenty four on Saturday last for a stay of some months in Minneapolis, Chicago, New York and Washington. mrs Kennicott confided to underscore Ye Scribe underscore that she will be connected with one of the multifarious war activities now centering in the Nation's Capital for a brief period before returning.

column2: Her countless friends who appreciate her splendid labors with the local Red Cross realize how valuable she will be to any war board with which she chooses to become connected.
column3: Her countless friends who appreciate her splendid labors with the local Red Cross realize how valuable she will be to any war board with which she chooses to become connected.

column2: Gopher Prairie thus adds another shining star to its service flag and without wishing to knock any neighboring communities, we would like to know any town of anywheres near our size in the state that has such a sterling war record.
column3: Gopher Prairie thus adds another shining star to its service flag and without wishing to knock any neighboring communities, we would like to know any town of anywheres near our size in the state that has such a sterling war record.

column2: Another reason why you'd better Watch Gopher Prairie Grow.
column3: Another reason why you'd better Watch Gopher Prairie Grow.

column2: Mr. and Mrs. David Dyer, Mrs. Dyer's sister, Mrs. Jennie Dayborn of Jackrabbit, and Dr. Will Kennicott drove to Minniemashie on Tuesday for a delightful picnic.
column3: mr and mrs David Dyer, mrs Dyer's sister, mrs Jennie Dayborn of Jackrabbit, and dr Will Kennicott drove to Minniemashie on Tuesday for a delightful picnic.

column2: CHAPTER XXXVII
column3: CHAPTER thirty seven

column2: I
column3: I

column2: SHE found employment in the Bureau of War Risk Insurance.
column3: SHE found employment in the Bureau of War Risk Insurance.

column2: Though the armistice with Germany was signed a few weeks after her coming to Washington, the work of the bureau continued.
column3: Though the armistice with Germany was signed a few weeks after her coming to Washington, the work of the bureau continued.

column2: She filed correspondence all day; then she dictated answers to letters of inquiry.
column3: She filed correspondence all day; then she dictated answers to letters of inquiry.

column2: It was an endurance of monotonous details, yet she asserted that she had found "real work."
column3: It was an endurance of monotonous details, yet she asserted that she had found "real work."
